author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Gear (Key Chains/Adventurers) - Johnny Thunder Key Chain Review
review:
This key chain is part of the LEGO Adventurers theme and I think this was one of my very first LEGO key chains ever. It's a really cool minifig to have as a key chain but the only problems I have with those is that you're not able to take off the legs, or the head.

Pros

  • Minifig looks cool

Cons

  • Legs, head and/or headgear don't come off

Summary

All in all it's a great set to get and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure.
